hadiths.text: Narrated 'Amr b. Suh'aib: On his father's authority, said that his grandfather 'Abd Allah b. 'Amr reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying: The proviso of a loan combined with a sale is not allowable, nor two conditions relating to one transaction, nor profit arising from something which is not in one's charge, nor selling what is not in your possession

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَبِيعُ مَا لَيْسَ عِنْدَهُ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Man Selling What He Does Not Possess
